name: ISDS - Intergalactic Sushi Delivery Service
description:
Our contribution as tutors to the "SRH Fachschule für IT und Medien Heidelberg - GameJam".
Of course, outside the rating.

The keywords were: technology, Asia and parallel world.

Controls: WASD, touch, mouse, game controller

Luca, Steffen and Sebastian  - programming and effects
Maike, Tim and Sabrina - graphics

music:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/sci-fi/universe-sounds-free-...
